title: Rock Chick Reawakening
description: From New York Times and USA Today bestselling author Kristen Ashley comes a new story in her Rock Chick series… A flashback in Kristen’s Rock Chick series, Rock Chick Reawakening shares the tale of the devastating event that nearly broke Daisy, an event that set Marcus Sloan—one of Denver’s most respected businessmen and one of the Denver underground’s most feared crime bosses—into finally making his move to win the heart of the woman who stole his.
author: Kristen Ashley
